name: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
name_original: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
description:
The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep is an arcade game developed by Atomic Planet Entertainment. It came out on 14-03-2008. It was published by Blast Entertainment.
The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep is available on PC.
It was produced by Barrie M. Osborne, Douglas Rae, Jay Russell and Robert Bernstein. It was directed by Jay Russell. It was scored by James Newton Howard.
